verses.verse: Now these are the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> that went <S%H5927>up<s%> with <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7597>Shealtiel<s%>, and <S%H3442>Jeshua<s%>: <S%H8304>Seraiah<s%>, <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, <S%H5830>Ezra<s%>,
<S%H568>Amariah<s%>, <S%H4409>Malluch<s%>, <S%H2407>Hattush<s%>, Malluch: or, Melicu
<S%H7935>Shechaniah<s%>, <S%H7348>Rehum<s%>, <S%H4822>Meremoth<s%>, Shechaniah: or, Shebaniah Rehum: or, Harim Meremoth: or, Meraioth
<S%H5714>Iddo<s%>, <S%H1599>Ginnetho<s%>, <S%H29>Abijah<s%>, Ginnetho: or, Ginnethon
<S%H4326>Miamin<s%>, <S%H4573>Maadiah<s%>, <S%H1083>Bilgah<s%>, Miamin: or, Miniamin Maadiah: or, Moadiah
<S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%>, and <S%H3114>Joiarib<s%>, <S%H3048>Jedaiah<s%>,

<S%H5543>Sallu<s%>, <S%H5987>Amok<s%>, <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%>, <S%H3048>Jedaiah<s%>. These were the <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and of their <S%H251>brethren<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3442>Jeshua<s%>. Sallu: or, Sallai

Moreover the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>: <S%H3442>Jeshua<s%>, <S%H1131>Binnui<s%>, <S%H6934>Kadmiel<s%>, <S%H8274>Sherebiah<s%>, <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H4983>Mattaniah<s%>, which was over the <S%H1960>thanksgiving<s%>, he and his <S%H251>brethren<s%>. the thanksgiving: that is, the psalms of thanksgiving
Also <S%H1229>Bakbukiah<s%> and <S%H6042>Unni<s%>, their <S%H251>brethren<s%>, were over against them in the <S%H4931>watches<s%>.
And <S%H3442>Jeshua<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H3113>Joiakim<s%>, <S%H3113>Joiakim<s%> also <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H475>Eliashib<s%>, and <S%H475>Eliashib<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H3111>Joiada<s%>,
And <S%H3111>Joiada<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%>, and <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H3037>Jaddua<s%>.

And in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3113>Joiakim<s%> were <S%H3548>priests<s%>, the <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%>: of <S%H8304>Seraiah<s%>, <S%H4811>Meraiah<s%>; of <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%>;
Of <S%H5830>Ezra<s%>, <S%H4918>Meshullam<s%>; of <S%H568>Amariah<s%>, <S%H3076>Jehohanan<s%>;
Of <S%H4409>Melicu<s%>, <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%>; of <S%H7645>Shebaniah<s%>, <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>;
Of <S%H2766>Harim<s%>, <S%H5733>Adna<s%>; of <S%H4812>Meraioth<s%>, <S%H2517>Helkai<s%>;
Of <S%H5714>Iddo<s%>, <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%>; of <S%H1599>Ginnethon<s%>, <S%H4918>Meshullam<s%>;
Of <S%H29>Abijah<s%>, <S%H2147>Zichri<s%>; of <S%H4509>Miniamin<s%>, of <S%H4153>Moadiah<s%>, <S%H6408>Piltai<s%>;
Of <S%H1083>Bilgah<s%>, <S%H8051>Shammua<s%>; of <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%>, <S%H3083>Jehonathan<s%>;
And of <S%H3114>Joiarib<s%>, <S%H4982>Mattenai<s%>; of <S%H3048>Jedaiah<s%>, <S%H5813>Uzzi<s%>;
Of <S%H5543>Sallai<s%>, <S%H7040>Kallai<s%>; of <S%H5987>Amok<s%>, <S%H5677>Eber<s%>;
Of <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%>, <S%H2811>Hashabiah<s%>; of <S%H3048>Jedaiah<s%>, <S%H5417>Nethaneel<s%>.

The <S%H3881>Levites<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H475>Eliashib<s%>, <S%H3111>Joiada<s%>, and <S%H3110>Johanan<s%>, and <S%H3037>Jaddua<s%>, were <S%H3789>recorded<s%> <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%>: also the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, to the <S%H4438>reign<s%> of <S%H1867>Darius<s%> the <S%H6542>Persian<s%>.

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%>, the <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%>, were <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697>chronicles<s%>, even until the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H475>Eliashib<s%>.

And the <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>: <S%H2811>Hashabiah<s%>, <S%H8274>Sherebiah<s%>, and <S%H3442>Jeshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6934>Kadmiel<s%>, with their <S%H251>brethren<s%> over against them, to <S%H1984>praise<s%> and to give <S%H3034>thanks<s%>, according to the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H4929>ward<s%> over <S%H5980>against<s%> <S%H4929>ward<s%>.

<S%H4983>Mattaniah<s%>, and <S%H1229>Bakbukiah<s%>, <S%H5662>Obadiah<s%>, <S%H4918>Meshullam<s%>, <S%H2929>Talmon<s%>, <S%H6126>Akkub<s%>, were <S%H7778>porters<s%> <S%H8104>keeping<s%> the <S%H4929>ward<s%> at the <S%H624>thresholds<s%> of the <S%H8179>gates<s%>. thresholds: or, treasuries, or, assemblies

These were in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3113>Joiakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3442>Jeshua<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3136>Jozadak<s%>, and in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5166>Nehemiah<s%> the <S%H6346>governor<s%>, and of <S%H5830>Ezra<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, the <S%H5608>scribe<s%>.

And at the <S%H2598>dedication<s%> of the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> they <S%H1245>sought<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> out of all their <S%H4725>places<s%>, to <S%H935>bring<s%> them to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, to <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H2598>dedication<s%> with <S%H8057>gladness<s%>, both with <S%H8426>thanksgivings<s%>, and with <S%H7892>singing<s%>, with <S%H4700>cymbals<s%>, <S%H5035>psalteries<s%>, and with <S%H3658>harps<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H7891>singers<s%> gathered themselves <S%H622>together<s%>, both out of the plain <S%H3603>country<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and from the <S%H2691>villages<s%> of <S%H5200>Netophathi<s%>;

Also from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%> <S%H1019><s%>, and out of the <S%H7704>fields<s%> of <S%H1387>Geba<s%> and <S%H5820>Azmaveth<s%>: for the <S%H7891>singers<s%> had <S%H1129>builded<s%> them <S%H2691>villages<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.
And the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H2891>purified<s%> themselves, and <S%H2891>purified<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and the <S%H8179>gates<s%>, and the <S%H2346>wall<s%>.

Then I brought <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> upon the <S%H2346>wall<s%>, and <S%H5975>appointed<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> companies of them that gave <S%H8426>thanks<s%>, whereof one <S%H8418>went<s%> on the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> upon the <S%H2346>wall<s%> toward the <S%H830>dung<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%>:
And <S%H310>after<s%> them <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H1955>Hoshaiah<s%>, and <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>,
And <S%H5838>Azariah<s%>, <S%H5830>Ezra<s%>, and <S%H4918>Meshullam<s%>,
<S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, and <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%>, and <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>,

And certain of the <S%H3548>priests'<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> with <S%H2689>trumpets<s%>; namely, <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4983>Mattaniah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4320>Michaiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2139>Zaccur<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph<s%>:

And his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%>, and <S%H5832>Azarael<s%>, <S%H4450>Milalai<s%>, <S%H1562>Gilalai<s%>, <S%H4597>Maai<s%>, <S%H5417>Nethaneel<s%>, and <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H2607>Hanani<s%>, with the <S%H7892>musical<s%> <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H5830>Ezra<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them.

And at the <S%H5869>fountain<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%>, which was over against them, they went <S%H5927>up<s%> by the <S%H4609>stairs<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, at the going <S%H4608>up<s%> of the <S%H2346>wall<s%>, above the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, even unto the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H4217>eastward<s%>.

And the <S%H8145>other<s%> company of them that gave <S%H8426>thanks<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> over <S%H4136>against<s%> them, and I <S%H310>after<s%> them, and the <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> upon the <S%H2346>wall<s%>, from beyond the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of the <S%H8574>furnaces<s%> even unto the <S%H7342>broad<s%> <S%H2346>wall<s%>;

And from above the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, and above the <S%H3465>old<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%>, and above the <S%H1709>fish<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%>, and the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H2606>Hananeel<s%>, and the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H3968>Meah<s%>, even unto the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%>: and they stood <S%H5975>still<s%> in the <S%H4307>prison<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%>.

So <S%H5975>stood<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> companies of them that gave <S%H8426>thanks<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, and I, and the <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H5461>rulers<s%> with me:

And the <S%H3548>priests<s%>; <S%H471>Eliakim<s%>, <S%H4641>Maaseiah<s%>, <S%H4509>Miniamin<s%>, <S%H4320>Michaiah<s%>, <S%H454>Elioenai<s%>, <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%>, and <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%>, with <S%H2689>trumpets<s%>;

And <S%H4641>Maaseiah<s%>, and <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%>, and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%>, and <S%H5813>Uzzi<s%>, and <S%H3076>Jehohanan<s%>, and <S%H4441>Malchijah<s%>, and <S%H5867>Elam<s%>, and <S%H5829>Ezer<s%>. And the <S%H7891>singers<s%> sang <S%H8085>loud<s%>, with <S%H3156>Jezrahiah<s%> their <S%H6496>overseer<s%>. sang: Heb. made their voice to be heard

Also that <S%H3117>day<s%> they <S%H2076>offered<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%>, and <S%H8055>rejoiced<s%>: for <S%H430>God<s%> had made them <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8057>joy<s%>: the <S%H802>wives<s%> also and the <S%H3206>children<s%> <S%H8055>rejoiced<s%>: so that the <S%H8057>joy<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> was <S%H8085>heard<s%> even afar <S%H7350>off<s%>.

And at that <S%H3117>time<s%> were <S%H582>some<s%> <S%H6485>appointed<s%> over the <S%H5393>chambers<s%> for the <S%H214>treasures<s%>, for the <S%H8641>offerings<s%>, for the <S%H7225>firstfruits<s%>, and for the <S%H4643>tithes<s%>, to <S%H3664>gather<s%> into them out of the <S%H7704>fields<s%> of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> the <S%H4521>portions<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> for the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and <S%H3881>Levites<s%>: for <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H8057>rejoiced<s%> for the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and for the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> that <S%H5975>waited<s%>. of the law: that is, appointed by the law for Judah: Heb. for the joy of Judah waited: Heb. stood

And both the <S%H7891>singers<s%> and the <S%H7778>porters<s%> <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H4931>ward<s%> of their <S%H430>God<s%>, and the <S%H4931>ward<s%> of the <S%H2893>purification<s%>, according to the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, and of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>.

For in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> and <S%H623>Asaph<s%> of <S%H6924>old<s%> there were <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H7891>singers<s%>, and <S%H7892>songs<s%> of <S%H8416>praise<s%> and <S%H3034>thanksgiving<s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%>.

And all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%>, and in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5166>Nehemiah<s%>, <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H4521>portions<s%> of the <S%H7891>singers<s%> and the <S%H7778>porters<s%>, every <S%H3117>day<s%> his <S%H1697>portion<s%>: and they <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> holy things unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>; and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> them unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%>. sanctified: that is, set apart
